mapper.sql: OddsID, ScheduleID, CompanyID, FirstHomeWin, FirstStandoff, FirstGuestWin, RealHomeWin, RealStandoff, RealGuestWin, ModifyTime, HomeWin_R, GuestWin_R, Standoff_R, isStopLive
mapper.select: select * from europeodds where ScheduleID = #{mid} and CompanyID = #{cpy} order by modifytime desc limit 1

SELECT #{companyId} companyId, #{matchType} matchType, #{satOdds} satOdds, #{endOdds} endOdds, #{beginDate} beginDate, o.OddsID oddsId, t.name_j hostName, t.flag hostIcon, t2.name_j guestName, t2.flag guestIcon, s.matchTime matchDate, o.FirstHomeWin satWin, mod(o.FirstHomeWin,0.25) satWinMod, o.FirstGuestWin satLose, mod(o.FirstGuestWin,0.25) satLoseMod, o.FirstStandoff satFlat, mod(o.FirstStandoff,0.25) satFlatMod FROM europeodds o LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE s on o.ScheduleID = s.ScheduleID LEFT JOIN team t ON s.hometeamid = t.teamid LEFT JOIN team t2 ON s.guestteamid = t2.teamid where o.CompanyID = #{companyId} and o.ScheduleID = #{matchId}
mapper.insert: insert into europeodds (OddsID, ScheduleID, CompanyID, FirstHomeWin, FirstStandoff, FirstGuestWin, RealHomeWin, RealStandoff, RealGuestWin, ModifyTime, HomeWin_R, GuestWin_R, Standoff_R, isStopLive) values (#{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firsthomewin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{firststandoff,jdbcType=REAL}, #{firstguestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{realhomewin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{realstandoff,jdbcType=REAL}, #{realguestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{homewinR,jdbcType=REAL}, #{guestwinR,jdbcType=REAL}, #{standoffR,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isstoplive,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into europeodds
OddsID,
ScheduleID,
CompanyID,
FirstHomeWin,
FirstStandoff,
FirstGuestWin,
RealHomeWin,
RealStandoff,
RealGuestWin,
ModifyTime,
HomeWin_R,
GuestWin_R,
Standoff_R,
isStopLive,

mapper.update:
update europeodds
ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FirstHomeWin = #{firsthomewin,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstStandoff = #{firststandoff,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstGuestWin = #{firstguestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
RealHomeWin = #{realhomewin,jdbcType=REAL},
RealStandoff = #{realstandoff,jdbcType=REAL},
RealGuestWin = #{realguestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HomeWin_R = #{homewinR,jdbcType=REAL},
GuestWin_R = #{guestwinR,jdbcType=REAL},
Standoff_R = #{standoffR,jdbcType=REAL},
isStopLive = #{isstoplive,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update europeodds set ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FirstHomeWin = #{firsthomewin,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstStandoff = #{firststandoff,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstGuestWin = #{firstguestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, RealHomeWin = #{realhomewin,jdbcType=REAL}, RealStandoff = #{realstandoff,jdbcType=REAL}, RealGuestWin = #{realguestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HomeWin_R = #{homewinR,jdbcType=REAL}, GuestWin_R = #{guestwinR,jdbcType=REAL}, Standoff_R = #{standoffR,jdbcType=REAL}, isStopLive = #{isstoplive,jdbcType=TINYINT} where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
